DOC.brief_summary: Safety of Percutaneous Tracheostomy in Clopidogrel and Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors
DOC.brief_title: Safety of Percutaneous Tracheostomy in Clopidogrel and Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors
DOC.detailed_description: We propose a retrospective review of our experience with bleeding complication in the presence of antiplatelet and SSRI therapy and compare the complications with those who were not on antiplatelet agents or SSRI.
DOC.criteria: on antiplatelet therapy or selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors(SSRI)
